name: Pollground
long_description: A social polling site. Pollground allows you to easily create surveys and allow the “wisdom of the crowd” to answer your questions. Questions and comments can be posted anonymously.

name: MetricWire
long_description:
MetricWire’s mobile platform allows decision makers, researchers, and stakeholders to harness unparalleled insights solutions, analytical tools, and deeper audience connections.  Our innovation has lead to real-time digital interventions, enriched research, and evidence-based decisions.

Capture more powerful data and make better decisions

name: unSurvey
one_liner: AI-led market research interviews, no scheduling, instant insights.

name: Markix
long_description: Markix helps you find better prospects, research markets and monitor key events, at the scale of the entire internet.
one_liner: Scan the web for fresh leads, research and key events

name: PromptLoop
long_description:
PromptLoop helps GTM teams automate account research and data enrichment at scale. We turn manual web scraping and qualification workflows into automated processes, enabling teams to enrich thousands of accounts with detailed company data and buying intent markers in minutes.

Why PromptLoop? Sales and marketing teams traditionally spend hours manually researching accounts or rely on outdated data providers. We automatically crawl and extract precise data points from company websites, social profiles, and public sources at 10% the cost of manual research, with built-in quality controls and strict sourcing. Teams can process 10k+ accounts simultaneously, turning raw URLs into actionable qualification data tailored to your goals.
one_liner: AI for market research and analysis

name: Versive
long_description:
Versive is an all-in-one research platform that helps teams make faster customer-informed decisions.
- Collect richer insights: AI-moderated studies that deliver interview-quality results at the survey speeds
- Accelerate your analysis: AI-assisted analysis that instantly turns transcripts into shareable insights

name: Outset
long_description: Outset offers AI-powered user interviews to conduct qualitative research. Traditional surveys are fast but lack depth while live interviews produce high quality data but are slow and expensive. Outset uses LLMs to lead interviews and synthesize results so researchers get high quality data 100 times faster.

name: Conveo
long_description: Conveo is an AI-powered platform for conducting and analyzing qualitative research through in-depth video and voice interviews. We help marketing, insights, product, and design teams gather customer insights 100x faster and at a fraction of the cost.
one_liner: Qualitative Research Conducted and Analyzed by AI

name: Dataleap
long_description:
Dataleap is a GenAI-powered market research platform for management consulting firms and corporate strategy departments. Think Perplexity for Consultants.

We combine the natural language interface from chatGPT with trusted, verifiable market data from best-in-class data providers. We do the heavy lifting of aggregating all data sources into a single interface.

We optimize the whole market research workflow from finding the right information, managing the internal knowledge base as well as sharing information with team members. 

We already work with leading consultancies like BCG and industry giants like Siemens Energy and Uniper.

name: Riveter AI
long_description:
Riveter brings AI web search and data labeling to spreadsheets. Enrich thousands of rows of data in minutes with ChatGPT-like prompts. Riveter saves Product, Ops, and GTM teams hours (or even days) of manual work cleaning, structuring and adding manual research to datasets–no engineers required.

Teams love Riveter for manual tasks like competitive research, cleaning event and conference attendee data, pricing analysis, and more.

name: Lopus AI
long_description:
Sales teams blast emails, spam LinkedIn, and chase leads who were never interested in the first place. Conversion rates are dropping, and buyers are tuning out. The problem isn’t a lack of prospects—it’s that most businesses are looking in the wrong places.

People and businesses talk about their pain points online every day—struggling with problems your product solves. We track these high-intent conversations, surface the right buyers, and deliver them straight to you. Just 20 minutes a day, and you’re engaging with people ready to buy, with conversion rates as high as 50%.

People are looking for your solution - you're just not seeing them. Let's change that.
one_liner: Finding customers who are ready to buy your product — on autopilot.

name: Artificial Societies
long_description:
Artificial Societies uses AI to simulate large groups of people and how they interact. Companies like Anthropic and 11x are using Artificial Societies to predict how their marketing and content will perform in a simulation of their target customers, before launching in the real world. 

This is a cracked team: James left rural China at age 14, got into Cambridge, turned down a CS PhD to do startups, and - in his spare time - lead the largest ever study of an LLM society. James is joined by Patrick, an applied behavioural scientist who has run over 200 real-world experiments for businesses including Fortune 500 companies. 

We joined forces through a shared frustration that no one really understands large scale human behaviours: traditional market research is not only slow and expensive, but fundamentally flawed - it misses how people influence each other. Humans are not isolated individuals, we are social animals.

We began by simulating a network of 1,000 investors, and used it to raise a pre-seed and get into YC. Since releasing this publicly as “Wave”, startup founders have run over 3000 simulations. 

We have since released "Reach", where anyone can simulate their own LinkedIn audience and test how their posts will perform before posting for real. Artificial Societies is doing for simulations what ChatGPT did for LLMs - making them accessible to everyone.

As AI advances, we will create representative models of entire human societies. Our vision is a world where all content, products, and policies are first simulated in an Artificial Society. We are on a mission to create Artificial Collective Intelligence - humans innovate in collectives, we want to scale collective innovation with ACI.
one_liner: We use AI to simulate entire human societies

name: Fira
long_description:
Fira is a financial research assistant that helps investment analysts spend less time on company research. It instantly searches and analyzes thousands of pages of unstructured company filings and earnings reports to provide source-cited answers and verifiable financial calculations.

Our mission is to create a financial AI co-worker deeply integrated into both internal and external data source. It will help with research and analysis, generating investment documents, and workflow automation. This will eventually allow investment professionals to spend less time on manual tasks and focus more on building relationships and making decisions.
one_liner: Agentic AI platform for investment firms
